snippet.title: Hidalgo reveal trailer - Coming soon to Kickstarter!
snippet.description:
Introducing Hidalgo reveal trailer!!

Hidalgo is a cozy and wholesome adventure game with unique art that simulates a handmade tabletop model. It allows players to experience the story of Don Quixote of La Mancha with innovative mechanics and a meaningful narrative about a family rediscovering themselves.

Wishlist on Kickstarter here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/infinitethread-games/hidalgo-a-cozy-adventure-game-on-don-quijotes-world

Follow our socials!

• TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@hidalgo_game
• Twitter - https://x.com/infinite_thread
• Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/hidalgo.game/
• Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/people/Hidalgo-Game/61563512603421/

#hidalgo #InfiniteThreadGames #singleplayer #adventure #cozygames #cozy #wholesome #wholesomegames #puzzlegame
